alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior York; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 10:28PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect northern York... southwestern Cumberland...north central Strafford...northeastern Belknap and southern Carroll Counties... At 1025 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was near Cornish, or 13 miles south of Naples...moving south AT 25 MPH. Expect a quick coating to up to an inch in spots and visibilities dropping to a half mile or less at times. Travel is not advised during these heavy snow showers. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location. If traveling pull off to a safe location. Locations impacted include... Portland, South Portland, Biddeford, Laconia, Westbrook, Alfred, Moultonborough, Ossipee, Meredith, Sanford, Saco, Gorham, Falmouth, Cape Elizabeth, Buxton, Alton, Hollis, Kennebunkport, Hiram and Effingham. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 95 between mile markers 29 and 53. This also includes... Lake Winnipesaukee, Fortunes Rock Beach, Higgins Beach, Crescent Beach State Park, and Scarborough Beach State Park. Peaks Island, Long Island, Cushing Island, Great Diamond Island, and Mackworth Island.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior York; Southern Oxford
